TopicTitle: is there a damage status mod?

Articles.Content: im testing an aero design and i notice i had a tail strike but nothing seemed to be damaged. i was wondering if there was a mod that tells you where and how much damage you took on a structure.

Parts don't have "damage" per se, they are either ok or exploded and not there. If you hit F3 during flight you can view the log that you see when you end a flight, and it will show a list of any parts that may have been destroyed, however there isn't any real way to determine where those parts were on your vessel.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/81794-0-24-2-Alpha-3-3-1-Dang-It!-A-random-failures-mod-(23-august)

This isn't what he was asking for, he was asking if there was a mod that TOLD you if you took damage, not a mod that causes damage
